data.title: Top 14 Mexican Wedding Catering in Summitville, NY
data.meta_description: Find your perfect mexican wedding caterers in Summitville, NY at Zola. We'll help you narrow down your caterer search in minutes.
data.text:
Fig & Pig continues to be a creative, quality-driven catering company devoted to showcasing seasonal ingredients and producing exceptional, food-focused events. Our team of professionally-trained chefs cook with dedication and pride to create thoughtful meals that are both comforting and modern. We work closely with our clients to build curated menus and distinctive settings that reflect the personality and vision of their event. At Fig & Pig, the service is as important as the food. Our front of house team drives the success of each event and they take very seriously, the needs of our guests.

Hungry for Travel is a catering company based in Red Hook, NY. The culinary expert, Chef Yolanda Lee, puts an emphasis on crafting delicious and healthy food that is full of flavor. Utilizing her aptitude for innovation combined with her exposure to worldly cuisine, Chef Yolanda offers an exciting menu full of contemporary dishes. Chef Yolanda attended the Culinary Institute of America school where she classically trained in the culinary arts. She continued to enhance and refine her skills by working in restaurants across the United States. She aims to leave each client happy and fulfilled.

Chef Sarah Chianese is an accomplished, award-winning chef & Wedding Industry Professional creating unique & memorable boutique wedding experiences for over a decade. She & her exceptional team at Mangia and Enjoy! provide the most flavorful, heart-warming, healthy and beautifully presented meals for you & your loved ones using local, organic & seasonal ingredients in a creative way - your experience, your palette's pleasure, and alway made with love! Local, organic, seasonal, farm fresh and full of Flavor! Mangia and Enjoy! has been featured in: Bridal Guide, Wedding Chicks, She Finds, Catersource, Dances With Her & more. WIPA, ICA & NACE.

Ginger Man Catering is a Glatt Kosher catering company in NYC formed by Chef Oren to offer custom Kosher catering and personalized service to our clients, while based in NYC, Chef Oren and his exemplary team will travel throughout New York City, Long Island, Hamptons, New Jersey and Connecticut area to create your specialized event in your home or at the venue of your choice. Ginger Man Kosher Catering NYC will work directly with you to ensure every detail of your events fulfills your expectations and results in a successful and pleasurable event.

A native of Trinidad and Tobago, Nikisha Williams found her calling to cuisine at a very young age. In the Caribbean, it was commonplace to share large meals with family and friends made from ingredients picked outside your door and seasonal harvest feasts were shared with the entire community. Nikisha learned quickly that good, nourishing food was a blessing meant to be celebrated and she developed a passion for celebrating it.

Great taste is the name of the game and we're committed to stepping up to the plate. Our goal is provide unforgettable, delicious, and eye catching options. That's why we prepare all of our boards and graze displays to your style, with the highest quality products. Whether it is an intimate dinner or an event for up to 800 guests, we do it all! If you are considering a Graze table for your wedding or next event, reach out and we'd be delighted to create something beautiful for you!

Looking for a catering company that offers exceptional cuisine and unparalleled service? Look no further than Noire Chef Boston. We create unforgettable dining experiences for any event, from intimate dinner parties to grand galas and everything in between. ​We pride ourselves on using only the highest quality ingredients to create dishes that are both inspiring and delicious. Our customized menus are tailored to your individual needs and preferences, ensuring that every dish is a perfect match for your event. We offer personalized attention to every detail, making sure your event is a success from start to finish. ​

Krisp Events is one of the top catering companies in New York. We bring to your party the best New York has to offer, using the finest seasonal and organic ingredients available. We pride ourselves on our international and eclectic menu and encourage suggestions for any customized menu requests. We pay very special attention to each event, and will gladly guide you through any planning to achieve the best possible experience for you and your guests. We look forward to providing you with a unique culinary event of excellence. Innovation combined with a strong work ethic is what makes Krisp who we are today.

Mill Creek Catering & Events is a premiere, full-service, off-premise caterer & event coordinator specializing in elegant, boutique weddings with a personalized touch. We are known for our inspirational, one of a kind events in spectacular locations with unsurpassed service. We help you to plan unique, seasonal menus designed to fit your vision and personal style, including cultural and ethnic trends. Our focus is on sustainability, and when possible, we use locally sourced ingredients. Our culinary team can accommodate an array of dietary needs.

A leading caterer in Connecticut located in the historic Black Rock District of Bridgeport, CT. We provide the highest standard of culinary excellence by using fresh, wholesome foods with a home-cooked flair and are dedicated to using both locally sourced and organic ingredients when available. Everything is made from scratch with intention and love, providing food that not only tastes good, but makes you feel good as well!

Our innovative presentation will redefine your perception of indulgence, combining sumptuous amenities and top tier dining options to create an impeccable experience tailored to your personal taste. Our culinary acumen with proficiency in contemporary cooking and commitment to sourcing the highest quality ingredient. With the service ranging from meal prep for individual and daily need, personal chef services for your intimate dinner, to gastronomic delight up to silver spoon class matrimonial soirees. Our team is well verse in every aspect of the event and will undoubtedly delivery top notch services.

Insatiable Eats has catered countless events and weddings in the Hamptons, Long Island and New York since 2005. We pride ourselves in providing the highest level of cuisine using both locally sourced and special imported ingredients. Whether casual or formal, intimate or grand, our team of professional service staff make sure no details go unnoticed.

Untraditional Eats was founded by a globe-trotting hyper polyglot who speaks 7 languages. That unparalleled exposure to different cultures, cuisines and ways of cooking, as well as an unmatched cultural sensitivity, makes us exceptionally great at what we do.
